adrFormatAddress: 603 Isham St, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
Leaving a review out of nostalgia, I'm glad to see that Maribel and company is still in business, it seems. Some of my earliest childhood memories and friends were made in that daycare. If you're reading this Maribel, I wish you many long, happy years ahead of you.

-Richard
(In your care 2000-2002)

text.text:

-Richard
(In your care 2000-2002)

originalText.text:
Marash Day Care is an incredible place. This is a family day care that creates a loving, nurturing environment where children thrive. Maribel and her family have decades of experience and it shows. The children do amazing projects that are fun and educational – everything from making fruit salads to learning about the planets to nature walks in the local parks and trips to the playgrounds. Maribel is an expert at understanding and meeting the social-emotional needs of babies and very young children. All of this has allowed my daughter to flourish emotionally, socially, and in her education.

My daughter started at Marash at 4 months old. She loves Maribel and loves going to school. Most days now that she is 3 she barely says goodbye to me when I drop her off – she just runs inside to start another fun day. We have grown to think of Maribel as a part of our family. I recommend Marash unconditionally. It's an amazing part of the Inwood community.

originalText.text:
We love Marash! My daughter has been here since she was 7 months old (now a year old). Maribel and her family are so loving and kind, and my daughter always has a huge smile on her face when we drop her off in the morning.

I had been worried about how the transition into daycare was going to go, but once we found Marash, my worried mind was put at ease. We get regular picture updates, daily reports (including naps, meals, books read, and activities she participated in), and the occasional work of art (aka finger painting and the like) to proudly hang in our home. We are very grateful for Maribel and Marash.

originalText.text:
I've had such a wonderful experience with Marash Daycare for my three kids.  They are so professional and loving -  the children are incredibly well cared for.  My kids are always happy to go, and it's heartwarming to see the relationships they've developed with the kids and the adults there.  I also love that my picky eaters happily eat the nutritious home-cooked meals provided at Marash.

In addition to being a safe and loving environment, Marash goes above and beyond with enrichment and play-based learning activities for the kids.  I'm always amazed to see pictures of what the kids have been up to!  It's a magical place.
